text: Hi Rebecca, nice work.  I really like the palette and style, it has a very traditional feel.  Can you give me some background on the character and setting for the story she is part of?
Hi Paul, thanks for the comments. For the background, she is part of a metaphorical st
She lives alone on a mountain range that is surrounded by an empty sky, which she wants to decorate with a moon. This moon represents her ambitions as they grow in each stage of the project.

This moon is held together by star shaped bolts, or star bolts, which represent the ideas that hold the ambition together. The more the moon grows, the more the star bolts struggle to hold it all together.

The moon eventually grows to the point where the star bolts can no longer hold it and break away, causing the whole thing to collapse. The star bolts are all the Woman is left with, which, after seeing one that she threw out of anger flash into the sky, she uses instead to create a starry sky.

The metaphor is inspired by a comic I read by Grant Snider, called 'The Nature of Ambition', which I connected to after going through a similar experience with a previous idea. The metaphor I got from it was to not forget what you started with, as the smaller ideas can be just as important and can sometimes have a bigger impact. I would love show you the animatic for further feedback, but I don't know if this chat would support its size.

Thanks again for the current feedback. I plan to keep the Woman as a 2D animation, and use 3D to help bring out sections of the environment, because of its simplicity so it can avoid looking flat in the final piece.
